item.title: It's My Dad's 59th
item.description: Happy Birthday Dad! Today my dad turns 59! My dad is the type of man that ran away from home because of the “restricting” rules of my grandparents and joined the Marines. It may sound like it was a dumb reason but, a he would tell you, it was the best decision of his life. His experience in the Marines proved to him the type of man he could become.
